thread.title: City snapshot: Cranswick's first half revenues top expectations

title: City snapshot: Cranswick's first half revenues top expectations
text:
01 Oct 2015 | By Alec Mattinson 
Pork supplier Cranswick’s first half revenues rise 10% up year-on-year, Britvic confirms Brazilian acquisition, bumper share price rises for the UK supermarkets and all the rest of this morning’s news from the City. Available to members only
